text: Mário Juliato (born May 21, 1944) is a Brazilian former football player and coach. He started his professional career at Ponte Preta as a center back, but prematurely ended his career because of a seriously injured knee when he was 22. Then he started his managerial career working in youth teams of Ponte Preta. Later, Juliato managed São Paulo, Coritiba, Náutico, Portuguesa, Vitória, Fortaleza, Santa Cruz, Goiás, Ceará, Internacional, Maringá and CSA.http://futpedia.globo.com/tecnicos/mario- juliatohttp://terceirotempo.bol.uol.com.br/quefimlevou_interna.php?id=2671&sessao;=f ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian football managers Category:São Paulo FC managers Category:Coritiba Foot Ball Club managers Category:Sport Club Internacional managers Category:Esporte Clube Vitória managers Category:Sport Club do Recife managers Category:Goiás Esporte Clube managers Category:Clube Náutico Capibaribe managers Category:Ceará Sporting Club managers Category:Paraná Clube managers Category:Association football central defenders
title: Mário Juliato
